name: Magma Miner
description:
--  Introduction  --

You are a scientist with a bright yellow helmet who researches volcanos. 

If you don't get out of the maze you will have to stay forever. 
as soon as you exit the labyrinth, it generates a new one and TPs you back in. 

--  Controls  --
  • move with WASD
  • find the Exit
  • Volcanos can cause lightings, which help you to see more, for parts of a second.
--  Thanks for Playing --

Thanks for playing, I would love to hear your feedback.

Maze generator code comes from: www.youtube.com/watch?v=EycOwb6sVpw
